author: bridge-bot
content: <davidecrapis> is there anyone that wants to give a status update on the progress on testnets for fusaka after the interop related to resource mgmt/limits/opcodes?

author: bridge-bot
content: <davidecrapis> there was quite some work around performance and benchmarks that are relevant to this group

author: bridge-bot
content: <davidecrapis> plus it would be helpful as we try to consolidate the process of how we can coordinate similar work for glamsterdam in advance, as the focus there will be L1 scaling
